name: Mixy
long_description:
Live out your DJ dreams with Mixy, the mind-blowing music app that lets you mash-up any song in seconds.

⁕ Add your songs
⁕ Instantly blend vocals and beats
⁕ Play and share your mashup anywhere

There’s no limit to your imagination!

⁕ Launched to #1 in Music on June 19th
⁕ 1.5M users in 3 months
⁕ 15M mashups made and growing

name: Mainflow
one_liner: A manual investing platform that's so primitive... it's pioneering.

name: Parrot
long_description: Parrot is the TikTok for language learning. We turn doomscrolling into fluency with personalized short-form video lessons backed by Stephen Krashen’s comprehensible input theory. In under 4 months, we’ve scaled to $220K ARR with an average LTV:CAC of 5.5, and power users averaging 35+ mins/day on Parrot. Our team of engineers, designers, and growth leaders have lived the frustration of ineffective apps and learning methods - we’re building the first language platform that actually works.

name: Zavo
long_description:
Zavo is the first AI-native platform for in-person commerce. We bring together payments, point of sale, and AI agents into one seamless system, giving every restaurant and retail business its own 24/7 digital workforce. 

Launched in April 2025, Zavo already powers 350+ small and medium-sized businesses.

With Zavo, businesses can:

- Accept in-person & online card payments
- Run their entire Food & Beverage or Retail operation through Zavo Point of Sale
- Save time and money with instant settlements and flat, transparent pricing on card fees
- Unlock AI agents that automate finance, operations, and customer engagement

The Zavo AI Agent Suite:

- CFO Agent - Your personal CFO. Knows every number. Delivers forecasts, reports, and real-time insights.
- Manager Agent - Your personal manager. Knows products, inventory, sales, and staffing to keep operations seamless.
- Customer Agent - Your front of house. Knows every customer, drives loyalty, repeat visits, and tailored relationships.

Our Vision:

SMEs drive the global economy yet remain underserved by large SaaS and AI providers. Zavo is building the future of in-person commerce, delivering enterprise-grade intelligence, automation, and modern payments to every local business.
one_liner: AI-Native operating system for in-person commerce

name: Multifactor
long_description:
The agentic era is here, but its foundation is dangerously insecure. A growing number of high-profile "AI agent gone rogue" security incidents make headlines each week.

As enterprise adoption of agentic software has far outpaced the development of applicable cybersecurity solutions, CISOs have loudly voiced a growing need for verifiable, fine-grained security controls on complex multi-agent systems. That's why we built Multifactor.

Multifactor offers best-in-class authentication, authorization, and auditing technologies for agentic systems, allowing users to securely and revocably share online accounts with agents while maintaining fine-grained permissions and a detailed event history. We are doing for AI security what Cloudflare did for web security, Okta did for identity security, and Wiz did for cloud security: defining the category.

A world-class "account manager" that allows agents to securely use online accounts on your behalf is just the start—our early enterprise partners include companies using AI agents to manage $7.5+ billion manufacturing supply chains, where the consequences for lapses in security are severe. Our patented AI security technology seamlessly integrates with existing agentic software to thwart attacks like prompt injection, so CISOs and end users alike can breathe a sigh of relief, without slowing the pace of AI adoption.
one_liner: Zero-trust authentication, authorization, and auditing for AI agents

name: Sunflower
long_description:
Sunflower is on a mission to create one trillion days sober. Our product is both a consumer app (think a "Duolingo for addiction") but also with a tele-therapy clinic inside. 

Consumer App: 
- We built the #1 AI Sponsor for any kind of addiction
- Beautiful visual progression tracking to power the core "task to be done" of addiction
- A twitter style social media for addicts 
- DIY learn content (think Masterclass for addiction) for all major addiction types 
- CBT based journaling exercises 

Tele-Therapy: 
- Think a "Early Medical Peter Attia" quality of clinic, but completely focused on addiction 
- Starting with talk therapy in CA & TX we're rolling out to all 50 states + MAT 
- Bringing together the worlds best doctors to create the most effective protocol for addiction 

Sunflower went from 0 - 100k MAU in less than 6 months, and now we're continuing the traction to create the #1 product for addiction for the 1.2B humans on this planet that struggle with this fundamental human problem.
one_liner: A "Duolingo for addiction" with a tele-therapy clinic inside. 🌻

name: Patent Watch
long_description:
We automate patent infringement detection. Our software interprets patents, identifies competing products, and generates claim charts showing who’s infringing and how.

Teams use us to:

- Find licensing and litigation targets
- Send cease-and-desist letters
- Find counter litigation
- Sell IP in wind-downs
- Accelerate M&A diligence

We also run AI invalidity and prior-art searches to help your patents hold up in court.

Companies spend up to $50k to file and maintain a single patent over its lifetime, but once it's granted, they let it collect dust. With Patent Watch, you can start turning your patent portfolio into revenue in 10 minutes.

name: Imagine AI
long_description:
Imagine AI is a task-based agentic AI that becomes your company's Head of Content. For B2B service firms, this means turning your partners' expertise into a pipeline-generating machine. Instead of executives spending 8+ hours a week trying to write posts, our AI performs deep research to build a 100-page persona, captures their authentic voice, and automates content that books meetings at named accounts.

Our college-dropout, second-time founding team includes Sky Yang (raised $150M as UCSD's youngest Student Body President) and Neo Lee (a Berkeley Math/AI researcher). The idea for Imagine AI came after a YC partner told us directly: founders and partners at B2B firms are experts at their jobs, but they consistently struggle to turn that expertise into effective marketing that drives revenue.

We launched just 8 weeks ago and have already reached $14k in revenue from 30 paying users, including forward-thinking firms like Conduit (YC '24). The demand is clear, with a 250+ person waitlist. The results are even clearer: one of our first users recently landed a $5M deal that originated from a single post our AI created.

We are displacing the expensive, low-ROI agency model by building the content OS for every LinkedIn-native B2B company. 

To see how we automate your pipeline, book a demo at https://calendar.notion.so/meet/skyyang333/ghost 

or connect with our CEO, Sky Yang, on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/skyyang/
one_liner: AI agent that handles all of your B2B content needs

name: Everest
long_description:
90% of SMBs rely on outsourced IT support companies to manage their IT. It's a $300B industry running on 10-20% margins. We're building AI support engineers to help outsourced IT solve support tickets 20x faster and increase margins to 70-80%. 

Yolanda worked as a Senior Support Engineer at Netflix. Her team ran 3x more efficiently than average outsourced IT support companies. We're now bringing the automation Netflix has to 140K companies globally.
one_liner: We build AI support engineers for outsourced IT services (MSPs)

name: Lua Global Inc
long_description:
Lua is putting the power of AI into the hands of SMBs globally.

Lua enables any business to launch AI powered sales, support and booking agents in minutes. Our agents seamlessly integrate into a partner’s existing systems and can be distributed across any channel in a couple of clicks (Web, App, Instagram, Messenger, WhatsApp, Email, Voice) - turning every conversation into a unified sales & support experience.

Lua was founded by Lorcan O Cathain (CEO) and Stefan Kruger (CTO)- experienced founders who have spent 15 - 20 years each scaling technology companies across emerging markets.

Lua has active customers in 7 countries and is integrated into some of the world’s largest revenue engines: Shopify, WooCommerce, Ordable, Nuitee, Square and more.

Reach out if you want to talk about how our agents can support in:
- Lowering CAC
- Improving basket conversion rates / ARPU
- Driving automated bookings
- Improving NPS
one_liner: Self-Serve AI powered Sales, Support & Booking Agents

name: Bear
long_description:
Bear AI helps companies show up AI search engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google AI Overviews. 

We provide analytics to track your brand's visibility, competitive intelligence to understand why competitors rank higher, and ways to improve your content for AI-powered search.
one_liner: Show up on AI Search Engines
